subject: Re: Another prototype diode device for EVP capture
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Jeremy,

Yes, it turned out to be 1530 AM that drifted in and then drifted out.

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Early Cuyler <ecuyler@...> wrote:
>
> Mike, you are coming up with some really neat devices. I listened to 
the recording and heard the music starting at 1:45. Maybe you picked up 
a local radio station?
> 
> Jeremy
